# Aletheia

> Multi-agent AI system coordinating specialized agents through Signal messaging.

Self-hosted, privacy-first distributed cognition. N agents (nous) + 1 human in topology. Dual-layer memory (Mem0 + sqlite-vec), automatic fact extraction, Signal messaging, HTTP API.

## Documentation
- [README.md](README.md): Architecture, directory structure, deployment, configuration, API reference
- [ALETHEIA.md](ALETHEIA.md): System manifesto and naming philosophy
- [RESCUE.md](RESCUE.md): Full recovery guide from scratch
- [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md): Change history with decision context

## Key Directories
- [nous/_example/](nous/_example/): Template agent workspace (SOUL.md, USER.md, AGENTS.md, etc.)
- [shared/bin/](shared/bin/): Shared scripts (pplx, scholar, browse, ingest-doc, aletheia-graph, nous-health)
- [shared/config/](shared/config/): Environment and tool configuration
- [config/](config/): Example gateway config (aletheia.example.json)
- [infrastructure/runtime/](infrastructure/runtime/): Gateway source (TypeScript, tsdown)
- [infrastructure/runtime/src/](infrastructure/runtime/src/): Module architecture (taxis, mneme, hermeneus, organon, semeion, pylon, prostheke, nous, distillation, daemon, koina)
- [infrastructure/memory/](infrastructure/memory/): Mem0 sidecar + Qdrant + Neo4j
- [infrastructure/prosoche/](infrastructure/prosoche/): Adaptive attention daemon
